issue.title: Allow ClassLoader to return multiple resources

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

issue.body:
Previously if the resources were in the same PathTree only one would be returned.

- Fixes #40371
